posts.title: Your Moral Responsibility to Write Reviews
posts.excerpt: If you don't write a review after purchasing something, the market becomes extremely one-sided. Either only angry customers share their experiences, skewing perception negatively, or only the business controls the narrative, skewing it positively. Taking a few minutes to publicly share your honest experience is how we maintain balanced, trustworthy information for everyone.
